name: I should've learned another spell
description:
I should've learned another spell

You only learned one spell in wizard school: how to become magnetic. Luckily, your enemies keep dropping big metal coins. Collect as many as you can, and compete to reach the top of the online leaderboard!

CONTROLS

  • Move - Arrow Keys
  • Magnetize - Z
  • Drop Coins - X
  • Interact - Enter

Made for ScoreSpace Jam #18, with the theme: Magnetic.

Assets used:

  • 0x72 - Dungeon Tileset II
  • Mounir Tohami - Pixel Art GUI Elements
